data.text:
It had been a short while since I came to Tracen Academy. One 
day, when I was looking for an Uma Musume to train together with―
data.processed:
<story>It had been a short while since I came to Tracen Academy. One 
<story>day, when I was looking for an Uma Musume to train together with―

data.text: Chomp!!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>Chomp!!

data.text: I was bitten by an Uma Musume.
data.processed: <story>I was bitten by an Uma Musume.

data.text: …………Kukuu ……Ha ha ha!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>…………Kukuu ……Ha ha ha!

data.text:
Wa-ha ha ha ha ha ha!! 
They're surprised, They're surprised～!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Wa-ha ha ha ha ha ha!! 
<story>They're surprised, They're surprised～!

data.text:
Wha-!? You don't know who this Windy-chan is……!? 
What the heck, you're quite an insolent fellow, huh!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Wha-!? You don't know who this Windy-chan is……!? 
<story>What the heck, you're quite an insolent fellow, huh!

data.text:
Hmph! The one standing before you is the Evil 
Genius, King of Darkness, the Demon Lord of 
this World! Shinko Windy-chan, that's me!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Hmph! The one standing before you is the Evil 
<story>Genius, King of Darkness, the Demon Lord of 
<story>this World! Shinko Windy-chan, that's me!

data.text:
Nii-shi shi shi shi!! 
You better remember this!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Nii-shi shi shi shi!! 
<story>You better remember this!

data.text: Ever since that day…… things like Jack-in-the-boxesーー
data.processed: <story>Ever since that day…… things like Jack-in-the-boxesーー

data.text: ……Puhuhuu.
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>……Puhuhuu.

data.text: Uhya hya hya hya hyaa-!!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>Uhya hya hya hya hyaa-!!

data.text: And pitfall trapsーー
data.processed: <story>And pitfall trapsーー

data.text:
Hehe……! 
Gyahahahahahaa-!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Hehe……! 
<story>Gyahahahahahaa-!

data.text:
For some reason, Shinko Windy would 
play pranks on me regularly.
data.processed:
<story>For some reason, Shinko Windy would 
<story>play pranks on me regularly.

data.text:
Ni shi shi shi-! You fell for it, you fell for it! 
That cream puff has horse radish in it!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Ni shi shi shi-! You fell for it, you fell for it! 
<story>That cream puff has horse radish in it!

data.text:
Amazing huh, shaking in your boots huh, you were thunderstuck 
huh!? Windy-chan is overwhelming, huh!? Waaha ha ha-!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Amazing huh, shaking in your boots huh, you were thunderstuck 
<story>huh!? Windy-chan is overwhelming, huh!? Waaha ha ha-!

data.text:
……wait, what's wrong? 
Why are you crying?
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>……wait, what's wrong? 
<story>Why are you crying?

data.text:
Eh? It hurts? ……Hmph, can't be helped! 
Drink this. It's not carbonated, it's just regular water.
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Eh? It hurts? ……Hmph, can't be helped! 
<story>Drink this. It's not carbonated, it's just regular water.

data.text:
Don't worry about it! 
……evil-doers always play with their prey!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Don't worry about it! 
<story>……evil-doers always play with their prey!

data.text:
With this, you'll recover……and then Gao! 
Shi shi shii, that's how Windy-chan perpetrates her evil schemes!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>With this, you'll recover……and then Gao! 
<story>Shi shi shii, that's how Windy-chan perpetrates her evil schemes!

data.text:
And then one day, I went to watch a 
few mock races and saw Shinko Windy.
data.processed:
<story>And then one day, I went to watch a 
<story>few mock races and saw Shinko Windy.

data.text: ―…… Haa, haa, haa, haa……!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>―…… Haa, haa, haa, haa……!

data.text:
That prankster aura was nowhere to be found. Focusing ahead, 
with a sharp look in her eye, seriously running through the dirt.
data.processed:
<story>That prankster aura was nowhere to be found. Focusing ahead, 
<story>with a sharp look in her eye, seriously running through the dirt.

data.text:
She unflinchingly pressed forward even covered in dirt. 
It made me think that she would manage to pull off a victory―
data.processed:
<story>She unflinchingly pressed forward even covered in dirt. 
<story>It made me think that she would manage to pull off a victory―

data.text: ……but.
data.processed: <story>……but.

data.text:
And now we're in the final straight, Shinko Windy presses the 
attack! Competing for the lead…… with 200m remaining!
data.name: Event Announcer
data.processed:
<story>And now we're in the final straight, Shinko Windy presses the 
<story>attack! Competing for the lead…… with 200m remaining!

data.text:
She had reached the final straight, but for some reason…… rather 
than focusing on what's ahead, she was looking from side-to-side.
data.processed:
<story>She had reached the final straight, but for some reason…… rather 
<story>than focusing on what's ahead, she was looking from side-to-side.

data.text: ……Haa, haa, haa, haa!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>……Haa, haa, haa, haa!

data.text:
(……～～～, damnit! This girl, 
she's infront of me but I can't pull ahead!)
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>(……～～～, damnit! This girl, 
<story>she's infront of me but I can't pull ahead!)

data.text:
(The time before, and the one before that, and the other one 
before that! There's always someone in my way―― ……damnit! The 
footsteps and cheering are all annoying!)
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>(The time before, and the one before that, and the other one 
<story>before that! There's always someone in my way―― ……damnit! The 
<story>footsteps and cheering are all annoying!)

data.text:
(The crowd, nobody's looking this way!! Irritating, distracting, 
I can't catch up, like this, if it's like this――)
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>(The crowd, nobody's looking this way!! Irritating, distracting, 
<story>I can't catch up, like this, if it's like this――)

data.text:
…… Grrrrrr～～～～! 
I don't want this!!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>…… Grrrrrr～～～～! 
<story>I don't want this!!

data.text: ――Chomp!!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>――Chomp!!

data.text: Kyaa!?
data.name: Uma Musume
data.processed: <story>Kyaa!?

data.text:
S-Shinko Windy!? 
Is Shinko Windy interfering!?
data.name: Event Announcer
data.processed:
<story>S-Shinko Windy!? 
<story>Is Shinko Windy interfering!?

data.text: …………Huu, haa, haa, haa……
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>…………Huu, haa, haa, haa……

data.text:
The results of deliberation. There is no change to the 
finishing order. Shinko Windy will be issued a strict warning.
data.name: Event Announcer
data.processed:
<story>The results of deliberation. There is no change to the 
<story>finishing order. Shinko Windy will be issued a strict warning.

data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>………… 
<story>……

data.text:
――The result was 2nd place. In the final straight, 
the girl she bit increased her speed and came 
in 1st place, pulling ahead by a neck.
data.processed:
<story>――The result was 2nd place. In the final straight, 
<story>the girl she bit increased her speed and came 
<story>in 1st place, pulling ahead by a neck.

data.text:
Interference was never the answer. 
But, it was painfully clear that she wanted to win.
data.processed:
<story>Interference was never the answer. 
<story>But, it was painfully clear that she wanted to win.

data.text:
……Hm? 
Y-you're――
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>……Hm? 
<story>Y-you're――

data.text:
I had called out to her, but I was 
still at a loss as to what to say――
data.processed:
<story>I had called out to her, but I was 
<story>still at a loss as to what to say――

data.text: Chomp!!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>Chomp!!

data.text:
I don't know why she suddenly attacked…… with nothing to say, 
I ended up spending several seconds just staring at Shinko Windy―
data.processed:
<story>I don't know why she suddenly attacked…… with nothing to say, 
<story>I ended up spending several seconds just staring at Shinko Windy―

data.text:
……Hehe, hehehehe……! 
……they're looking, they're looking this way.
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>……Hehe, hehehehe……! 
<story>……they're looking, they're looking this way.

data.text:
Wahahahahaha-! 
They were looking this wayーー!!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Wahahahahaha-! 
<story>They were looking this wayーー!!

data.text: Fast as fast can be, you'll never catch me!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>Fast as fast can be, you'll never catch me!

data.text:
Shinko Windy ran off in high spirits, 
for now, I ended up chasing after her.
data.processed:
<story>Shinko Windy ran off in high spirits, 
<story>for now, I ended up chasing after her.

data.text:
She ran ahead with a smile on her face…… 
it was a smile that made me think she was having fun.
data.processed:
<story>She ran ahead with a smile on her face…… 
<story>it was a smile that made me think she was having fun.
